title: Harm hides at home
creator_credit: Film Company of America, S Tapper and Karl H. Dempwolf
brief_description: Safety Woman is involved in the rescue of children from potentially dangerous situations in the home. After each rescue she discusses the rules of home safety with the children. Covers fire, guns, ladders, stairways, spills and the storage of toxic household products.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Company of America, S Tapper and Karl H. Dempwolf
